name: Lane Runner (BD Games)
description:
Are you looking for a running and creative game? If you are a big fan of runner, let’s join Lane Runner. 

Lane Runner - One of the best Running Games.

Download and have a great time playing with this amazing game.

Game Features:

+ Very easy game play mechanics with hundreds of unique levels.

+ Once you start your stage, you will never stop playing.

+ Dash your way through the village for fun running adventures.

+ Do your best to avoid collide with a stone.

+ Test your reflexes and agility in this addictive game.

+ Colorful 3D graphics.

+ Addictive episodes that are not boring at all.
